titles: Pharisaisme and Christianity compared and set forth in a sermon at Pauls Crosse, May 1. 1608. By I.H. Vpon Matth. 5.20.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bul-head,
